value:
$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Heh... It's time, spawn of Askr... Time
for me to rip you open.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Oh, $Nu...
I'm so scared! He wasn't like this
before... Was he?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|I suspect there's a reason for that...
But what I care about right now is
finding out about Zacharias.$k$pPrince Bruno! What did you do to
Zacharias? Tell us everything you
know!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Heh... You...want to know what...I
did? Take...a look...and then...ask me
again...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Zacharias's lance!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Yes, I took his life. He peered into
places he should not, and brought
one of Embla's secrets into the light...$k$pIt was so sad... He was all alone...
There was nothing he could do to
save himself...from me.$k$pIt was pathetic. With his dying breath...
he begged for his life. He called out
your names!$k$p"I'll do anything you ask! Just let me
live!" Bwa-ha-ha!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Oh, Zacharias...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|You...murderer!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Show me how you really feel...with
your blade! You'll be seeing
Zacharias soon enough if you do!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Do it. Kill me. Do it now! I told you
before... You'll regret it if you don't.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|One last time, Bruno...did you really
kill Zacharias?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Hah! This again? Yes! I killed him!
And I'll make sure you and your
sister suffer the same fate.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Very well. The time to avenge my
friend...has come.$k$p$EFace|Yes, $Nu?
What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|What? No, that can't be true...$k$p$EFace_Anger|How could it be?$k$pIf it is, then...that'd mean...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$w0|What is it, Brother?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|We completed the rite with the
sending stone, yet we didn't hear
Zacharias' voice.$k$pIf he was alive, we would have. We
assumed that he was dead. But
there's another possibility...$k$pWe did speak to Zacharias during the
rite.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|What?$k$p$EFace_Cool2|That means...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Prince Bruno, of the Emblian Empire,
I ask you now...$k$pAre you Zacharias?$k$p$Sbs150|
